articles.title: Another big Sho: Ohtani hits 2 homers, ties record with 4 extra-base hits in World Series Game 3 - AP News
articles.description: Shohei Ohtani homered twice and tied a 119-year-old major league record with four extra-base hits in Game 3 of the World Series, putting on yet another historic postseason show at Dodger Stadium. Ohtani led off the bottom of the first inning with a ground-rul…

articles.title: Monday Night Football: Chiefs run past Commanders 28-7 - NBC Sports
articles.description: The Chiefs gained 276 yards and scored 21 points in the second half as Patrick Mahomes tossed three TDs.

articles.description: Eagles chief of security Dom DiSandro popped by to check in on injured Giants rookie Cam Skattebo in the hospital and made sure to make the NFC East rival feel at home.
